tool.name: Intersect
tool.description: two gff3 files. Only top-level features
tool.help:
**What it does**
Given two input GFF3 files, this tool computes the intersection of those files, and then produces two outputs, the members of the intersection in A and in B.
**How it works** For each top-level entry in the GFF3 A file, input GFF3 B is searched for features that map to an embedded or overlapped position in the genome by coordinates. Those features in A with matches in B are output to a new GFF3. The same occurs in the opposite direction.
